topics.body: Shit guys, can you help out? I have to make a soundtrack for "Catcher in the Rye" with a minimum of ten songs, and I only have seven. They have go with either specific scenes in the book or the book's theme. Anyone have ideas? The genre of the song doesn't matter, nor does cursing - the teacher is pretty chill.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a703a8636872309ec41100#post_54a703a8636872309ec41100

Catcher in the Rye? Basically a boy's struggle to fight against social norms. With prostitutes, cursing, and a whole slew of things that got it banned from most "quality establishments" in the 1940's.
